there three beautiful yarn packs available that you could choose for your blanket and each one is inspired by the sights of countryside around me as i enjoy walking with my dog… yarn packs black sheep wools website wild hedgerow inspired by the rich fruits and berries clustered all over on the branches of the hedgerows and the golden leaves falling around me in the autumn open fields these colours remind me of walking out under the big open sky with wild unkept spaces and fields surrounding me sweet meadow in the height of summer when the grass is tall and golden and the meadows are filled with tiny bright flashes of colour from wild flowers © 2019 sandra paul 3 of 28 nature s walk blanket free www cherryheart co uk essential information skill level easy/intermediate this pattern mostly uses basic stitches worked in the round some intermediate stitches and techniques are used crochet charts are included for the square patterns only yarn available in a choice of three different packs wild
